alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Levy; Inland Citrus; Inland Levy (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:03PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Citrus and Levy Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 403 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fowlers Bluff to 7 miles west of Williston Highlands to near Rainbow Lakes Estates. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Inverness, Chiefland, Bronson, Homosassa Springs, Beverly Hills, Williston Highlands, East Bronson, Crystal River Airport, Fowlers Bluff, Black Diamond, Homosassa, Inverness Highlands South, Inverness Highlands North, Manattee Road, Andrews, Hernando, Sugarmill Woods, Inglis, Otter Creek and Lecanto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
